attributes.title: Terrible app!
attributes.review: This app is horrible. It was obviously made by white men who take joy in erasing the rights of everyone else to secure their oligarchy. I can’t wait for November when I can vote to support our future, our climate, and our world.

attributes.title: LIBERAL FAKE NEWS...!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in the hopes to support MY president and to KEEP AMERICA GREAT...but after a while, it started giving me subtle LIBERAL messages. It tried to convince me that SOCIALISM is better...! This is A way for the DEMOCRATS to try to convince you to vote for Biden...do not listen to this fake news...!!
